docs.title: About
docs.text: Hi there and welcome. I am Victor Nyabuti Ong’era a PhD Candidate in Sustainable Development & Climate Change at IUSS Pavia. My research focuses on crop simulation models

docs.title: ICASA File X creation guide
docs.text: This native page mirrors your ICASA guide with MkDocs Material components so it renders perfectly without raw HTML.

docs.title: Introduction to ICASA Standards
docs.text:
ICASA standards ensure consistency, interoperability, and proper documentation of agricultural field experiments.

Why ICASA matters

  • Consistency: standardized variable names and formats
  • Interoperability: share data across models and platforms
  • Documentation: complete metadata for reproducibility
  • Quality control: validation and error checking

docs.title: Quick start templates
docs.text:
Choose a template to get started quickly or follow the detailed guide below.

Basic crop experiment
  • Single crop variety
  • Basic weather data
  • Standard soil profile
  • Control treatment
Irrigation study
  • Multiple irrigation levels
  • Water stress analysis
  • Irrigation scheduling
  • Yield response
Fertilizer trial
  • Nitrogen rates
  • Application timing
  • Soil analysis
  • Economic analysis
Variety comparison
  • Multiple cultivars
  • Phenology tracking
  • Yield components
  • Adaptation analysis

docs.title: 1) File setup and basic structure
docs.text:
*EXP.DETAILS: UFGA2024 soybean irrigation study
@INSI    . . . . . . . .  INSTITUTION
UFGA
@LONGLATI  . . . . . . .  LONGITUDE LATITUDE
-82.37 29.63
@ELEV  . . . . . . . .  ELEVATION
40

ICASA naming convention

INSTI + YEAR + EXNO + CROP + "." + EXT (e.g., UFGA2401.SBX)

docs.title: 2) General simulation controls
docs.text:
@N GENERAL
NYERS NREPS START SDATE RSEED
1 1 S 2024180 2150

@N OPTIONS
WATER NITROGEN PHOSPHOR MINERAL DISEASES
Y Y N N N

@N METHODS
LIGHT EVAPOTRANSPIRATION PHOTOSYNTHESIS
1 1 1

@N MANAGEMENT
PLANTING IRRIGATION FERTILIZER RESIDUE HARVEST
R R F R R

@N OUTPUTS
DAILY SUMMARY GROWTH WATER NITROGEN
Y Y Y Y Y

docs.title: 3) Treatments
docs.text:
@N TREATMENTS    4
@N TRNO R O C TNAME
 1 1 1 1 1 Control - No irrigation
 2 1 1 1 2 Low irrigation - 50% ET
 3 1 1 1 3 Medium irrigation - 75% ET
 4 1 1 1 4 High irrigation - 100% ET

docs.title: 4) Cultivars
docs.text:
@N CULTIVARS
@N CR INGENO CNAME
SB UF000001 McCurdy 84aa

docs.title: 5) Fields
docs.text:
@N FIELDS
@N ID_FIELD WSTA....  FLSA  FLOB  FLDT  FLDD  FLDS  FLST
UFGA0001 UFGA2024      0     0 DR000  100    0    0
@N  SOIL_ID
UFGA0001

docs.title: 6) Initial soil conditions
docs.text:
@N INITIAL CONDITIONS
@N PCR ICDAT  ICRT  ICND  ICRN  ICRE  ICWD  ICRTILL
MA 2024180  1000   -99     1     0    15   -99
@N  ICBL  SH2O  SNH4  SNO3
  5 0.25  1.5  8.2
 15 0.27  1.2  7.8
 30 0.30  1.0  6.5
 60 0.32  0.8  5.2
 90 0.35  0.6  4.1

docs.title: 7) Planting details
docs.text:
@N PLANTING DETAILS
@N PDDATE EDATE  PPOP  PPOE  PLME  PLDS  PLRS  PLRD  PLDP  PLWT  PAGE  PENV  PLPH  SPRL
2024181   -99   12.   -99     S     R    61    -99     5   -99   -99   -99   -99   -99

docs.title: 8) Irrigation
docs.text:
@N IRRIGATION
@N IMDATE IMTYPE  IMCOD  IIRRI  IMDEP  IMTHR  IMAMT  IMEA  IMEV  IMRO
2024190     IR     1      25    30    0.50    25     1.0   0.0   0.0
2024200     IR     1      25    30    0.50    25     1.0   0.0   0.0
2024210     IR     1      25    30    0.50    25     1.0   0.0   0.0

docs.title: 9) Fertilizers
docs.text:
@N FERTILIZERS
@N FDATE  FMCD  FACD  FAMN  FAMP  FAMK  FAMC  FAMO  FLIT  FMDEP  FMTHR
2024180 FE005 AP002    30     0     0     0     0     0    10   -99
2024190 FE005 AP002    40     0     0     0     0     0    10   -99

docs.title: 10) Harvest details
docs.text:
@N HARVEST DETAILS
@N HDATE  HASTC  HCOM  HPC  HBPC HPLW  HPLD  HPWD HARVNO
2024300     M     C    0     0   -99   -99   -99   -99

docs.title: Validation and testing
docs.text:
Syntax checklist

  • * section headers present
  • @ variable headers present
  • Proper spacing and alignment
  • Missing values use -99
  • Dates in YYYYDDD format

Common issues

  • Treatment levels don’t match section entries
  • Invalid date sequences
  • Missing required sections
  • Inconsistent units
  • Broken file references

docs.title: Best practices
docs.text:
• Use consistent naming conventions and version control
  • Validate before running, check parameter ranges
  • Share standard formats and document metadata

docs.title: Resources
docs.text:
• ICASA v2.0 Standards: https://dssat.net/data/standards_v2/
  • ICASA Standards Paper: https://dssat.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/White2013ICASA_V2_standards.pdf
  • Master Variable List: https://agmip.github.io/ICASA.html

docs.title: Master plan
docs.text:
DSSAT File X master plan

Welcome to the complete guide for mastering DSSAT File X. This native page uses MkDocs Material components (tabs, callouts, and code blocks) so it renders everywhere without custom HTML.

docs.title: Course overview
docs.text:
The lesson plan will guide you through structure, components, and best practices for creating and managing experiment files effectively.

At a glance

  • Duration: 4–6 hours
  • Level: Intermediate
  • Outcome: Mastery of File X

docs.title: Learning objectives
docs.text:
• Understand File X structure
  • Configure simulation controls
  • Design treatment structures
  • Validate and troubleshoot

docs.title: Lessons
docs.text:
Lesson 1: Introduction Lesson 2: File structure Lesson 3: Simulation controls 
@N OPTIONS    WATER NITROGEN PHOSPHOR MINERAL DISEASES
Y Y Y N N N

@N METHODS    LIGHT INTERCEPTION EVAPOTRANSPIRATION
1 1 1

@N MANAGEMENT PLANTING IRRIGATION FERTILIZER RESIDUE HARVEST
R R F R R

@N OUTPUTS     DAILY SUMMARY GROWTH WATER NITROGEN
Y Y Y Y Y
  • Management codes: R=Reported, A=Auto, F=Fixed, N=None
  • Output controls: choose frequency and processes
Lesson 4: Treatments 
@N TREATMENTS    6
@N TRNO R O C TNAME
 1 1 1 1 1 T1: Control
 2 1 1 1 2 T2: High Density
 3 1 1 2 1 T3: Irrigated
 4 1 1 2 2 T4: High Density + Irrigation
 5 2 1 1 1 T5: Fertilized
 6 2 1 2 2 T6: Full Treatment
  • TRNO treatment number, R rep, O block, C rotation, TNAME description
  • Level numbers: 0=no data, 1=first entry, 2=second, n=nth
Lesson 5: Advanced topics

docs.title: What is DSSAT File X?
docs.text:
File X is the experiment details file that defines experimental conditions, treatments, and simulation parameters.

Key point

File X is the bridge between your experimental design and the crop simulation model.

docs.title: File naming convention
docs.text:
INSTI + YEAR + EXNO + CROP + "." + EXT
Example: UFGA8801.SBX
- UFGA: Institution/Location Code
- 88: Year (1988)
- 01: Experiment Number
- SB: Crop Code (Soybean)
- .SBX: File Extension

docs.title: File organization
docs.text:
*EXP.DETAILS  Experiment identification
*GENERAL      Simulation timing and control
*TREATMENTS   Treatment definitions and factor levels
*CULTIVARS    Variety and genetic coefficients
*FIELDS       Field conditions and soil references
*INITIAL CONDITIONS  Starting soil conditions
*PLANTING DETAILS    Planting information
*IRRIGATION   Water management schedules
*FERTILIZERS  Nutrient management plans
*HARVEST DETAILS      Harvest timing and methods

docs.title: Section headers and formatting
docs.text:
*EXP.DETAILS: UFGA8801.SBX
@INSI  . . . . . . . .  INSTI
UFGA
@LATI  . . . . . . . .  LATITUDE
29.63
@LONG  . . . . . . . .  LONGITUDE
-82.37
@ELEV  . . . . . . . .  ELEVATION
40
  • * indicates section headers
  • @ indicates variable header lines
  • ! indicates comment lines
  • Blank lines are ignored

docs.title: Missing data handling
docs.text:
Conventions

  • -99 integer missing values
  • -99.0 real missing values
  • Blank fields: missing or default
  • NA not applicable

docs.title: Validation checklist
docs.text:
• Verify headers (*, @)
  • Validate data alignment and formats
  • Confirm missing value codes
  • Confirm logical sequences and references

docs.title: Workflow integration
docs.text:
1. Weather preparation (FILEW)
2. Soil profile setup (FILES)
3. Cultivar selection (FILEC)
4. Experiment design (FILEX)
5. Batch processing
6. Output analysis
